attributes.action: Scots living within the UK, demand a vote in all upcoming Scottish referendums
attributes.background: I a Scottish born citizen living within the UK demand the right to vote in any upcoming Scottish referendums! I believe I have a democratic right to vote in a decision which may affect me and other Scottish born citizens residing in the UK. We demand a say on our future!

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
